":"")+strAttributes.join(" ")+">";}function domNodeToHTMLString(root,reporter){var depth=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:0;var html="";if(root.type==="tag"){var strChildren=root.children.reduce(function(prev,curr){var convertedNode=domNodeToHTMLString(curr,reporter,depth+1);return""+prev+convertedNode;},"");html=""+renderOpeningTag(root.name,root.attribs)+strChildren+"</"+root.name+">";}else if(root.type==="text"){var text=(0,_stringifyEntities.default)(root.data);html=text;}typeof reporter==="function"&&reporter(root,depth,html);return html;}
